articles.author: Surendra Singh
articles.title: Asia’s largest 4-metre liquid mirror telescope inaugurated in Uttarakhand - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: India News: In another scientific milestone for India, Asia’s largest 4-metre International Liquid Mirror Telescope (ILMT) was inaugurated at Devasthal in Uttarak.
